name: 3.4.1.30. Political Calm

cf.path: Map Notes#/CF_SEP/PFRPG - Kingdom Building - GM Version

content:
A sudden absence of political machinations coincides with an increase in public approval. Unrest decreases by 1d6.

Until the next Event phase, you gain a +2 bonus on checks to resolve continuous events.

If your kingdom has no Unrest and no continuous events, both Loyalty and Stability increase by 1.

If you are using Law settlement modifiers for the kingdom, this also increases Law by 1 for the entire kingdom
